text: Megan Mullally (born November 12, 1958 in Los Angeles) is an American television performer and stage actress who won two Emmy Awards for her Will & Grace acting. She worked for theater in Chicago and has done many performances in multiple Broadway musicals. She also starred in many television programs besides Will & Grace. She has been married to Nick Offerman since 2003. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American television actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:American stage actors Category:1958 births Category:Living people
title: Megan Mullally
